Detailed Description

The following definitions are transitional and will be replaced by definitions that are not so tied to the Berkeley socket style.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct IPDR_tag_Socket IPDR_SocketHandle
 

An opaque socket, whose contents may change in the future.

See also:
Defs.h

Check whether a socket is valid (opened).
